Robert Wenner wrote:

> On Tuesday 16 March 2004 19:14, pompee_c wrote:
> 
>  > I am getting the following error while running the Junit test:
>  > junit.framework.AssertionFailedError:No tests found <path>
> 
> Follow JUnit's convention and make your test methods public void textXyz()
> for JUnit to recognize them.
> Derive your test classs from TestCase.
> Give the name of that test class on the command line to the test runner.
> Read the FAQ: http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm

Read a tutorial: 
http://www.diasparsoftware.com/articles/JUnit/jUnitStarterGuide.html
